textBox.richText: This is Odysseus, or Odie for short. He’s an Irish Short Legged Jack Russell Terrier. He goes by many names, My dad calls him “The little terrorist”. I’m not very familiar with Jack Russells, but odie sleeps like a normal human being, not really like a dog. he lies sideways as you can see, and usually puts his head(only) on a pillow and covers up half his body under the sheets. it’s very odd but extremely funny.
